name: Golem Slayer - Concept Demo
description:
The world is ravaged by Golems and the demons who ride them. And a lone warrior roams across these broken lands; made immortal by ancient rites...

This is a concept demo. It's not intended as a full game but rather an exploration of ideas. I'm no artist, so the sprites are mostly from rvros monster pack here on itch and the music is from Alexander Nakarada (www.serpentsoundstudios.com). Its only 3 levels long (~15 min) but I hope you enjoy the game. Feel free to provide any feedback in the comments section below.
